attributes.action: Ban puberty blockers for children. Stop this abuse of children.
attributes.background: Children are going through enough changes physically and mentally Many suffer body dismorphia, or simply struggle with puberty change. Many are embarrassed by body changes. Many are confused in puberty. This is an abuse of our children, confusing them even more and causing irreversible damage.

rejection.details:
In December 2024, the Government announced it was making a ban on puberty blockers indefinite. You can read more about this on the GOV.UK website: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/ban-on-puberty-blockers-to-be-made-indefinite-on-experts-advice
